title: Aelaan-E-Jung
summary: Experience the electrifying pulse of Mumbai's dance scene at our event! Witness top group and solo professionals compete for thrilling prizes from a 30k pool. Don't miss the spotlight on the city's finest dancers!

faq.question: Who all can participate?
faq.answer: Whether you are a group of 2-25 people or a solo you are eligible to take part the ultimate dance arena. Age limit 26 years.

faq.question: How many rounds?
faq.answer: 2 rounds will be conducted. 1st round would be the showcase round of each team. The top teams will qualify for 2nd round i.e. battle round.

faq.question: What is the theme & judging criteria?
faq.answer: The theme is hip-hop/ Bollywood belonging to Mumbai. Judging would be based on overall impact, creativity, energy, sync & audience cheering.

faq.question: Payment of registration fee?
faq.answer: Payment of all team members should be done all together via online payment methods.

faq.question: How do we stay updated about timings and other details?
faq.answer: The participants would be receiving a WhatsApp group link via mail through which they would be updated about the event.

faq.question: Can you bring your friends to the event?
faq.answer: All your friends and family are welcome to be in the audience and enjoy.

rules: The decision of the AEJ organising committee and the judges will be final.
Participants must register in groups and members should be unique to their group. (Minimum group size - 5)
The scores given by judges will decide all the eliminations/qualifications.
Dance performances must be without any vulgarity.
The event will consist of four rounds.
All participants must strictly adhere to the given time limits.
Teams should prepare for the showcase round and the grand finale beforehand.
Teams need to submit their tracks for the showcase round on/before the given date.
All participants should carry their ID proofs (Aadhar/Driving/PAN) on the event day.
Violation of rules will lead to disqualification.

title: Carnival
summary: Get ready to unleash your inner fashion icon! Carnival is here, a competition where the fiercest design rivals clash in a dazzling display of creativity. This isn't just a show, it's a battleground for bold ideas and show-stopping style. Transform the runway with your most innovative looks and compete for ultimate fashion glory!  Register right now or you'll be STRESSED later. This is your chance to SERVE some LOOKS that'll have everyone SHOOK.  Let's get this fashion party STARTED!

faq.question: My college doesn't have a fashion team, can I still participate?
faq.answer: You can form a group of interested individuals and apply.

faq.question: Will our hair and make-up be looked after?
faq.answer: Participants are expected to look after their own make-up for the event.

faq.question: Will we be provided refreshments?
faq.answer: Light snacks and nourishment shall be provided.

faq.question: Wil travel expenditure be accounted for?
faq.answer: Participants are expected to look after their own travel and accommodations.

faq.question: Where will the event take place?
faq.answer: The event will take place in the quadrangle of S.P.I.T.

rules: A team can have up to 5-20 members.
Each team has to decide their theme for the fashion team.
Each team will get around 15-20 mins for their performance.
Participants are expected to dress decently to maintain decorum.
Use of drugs, cigarettes, and alcoholic beverages is strictly prohibited.
Scores will be given on creativity, performance, use of props/unique elements, and synchronization.
Teams are to prepare their CD and Pendrive for their performance.
The decisions of the judges will be final.
The organizing team will have the right to disqualify the team in case of grave disturbance. The decision of the organizing team will be final.

title: Cube Open
summary: Oculus Cube Open is the legacy event of Oculus fest. It is a 2 Day Rubik's Cube Competition having eight different events from 3*3*3 to Puzzles like pyraminx and clock. Participants are from college and also from outside college.

faq.question: Do I use my own cube to compete?
faq.answer: Yes you should bring your own cube.

faq.question: What is the normal age of competitors at these events?
faq.answer: All ages are welcome to participate.

faq.question: How do I find results?
faq.answer: All results are posted on the WCA page within a week after the competition finishes. However, for the day of competing, go to WCA Live to find information about current events.

faq.question: Are there age divisions?
faq.answer: Nope! All competitors compete together.

faq.question: I want to attend, or I have friends/family who want to attend, but not compete. Do they need to pay as well?
faq.answer: No. All spectators are free to view the competition at no cost.

rules: Participants must reach on the time of their group and adhere to WCA regulations

title: Oculus E-Sports
summary: Ascend to greatness in the heart of Esports! Get set for an adrenaline-fueled showdown as we host Valorant, BGMI, FIFA, and Clash Royale battles. Unleash your skills, strategize, and dominate the virtual arena like never before. Join us for the ultimate gaming experience at Ascend Esports - where champions are made!

faq.question: Do I need to be a hardcore gamer to take part?
faq.answer: No, Casual or Hardcore, Oculus e-Sports is Open For All.

faq.question: Will I have fun?
faq.answer: SAY WHAT? OF COURSE!

faq.question: What kind of games are available to play?
faq.answer: We have a lot of exciting games for you to play, competitively or casually, like Valorant, CODM, FIFA on PS5, etc.

faq.question: Can I play with my friends?
faq.answer: A resounding YES! We want all of you to have fun!

faq.question: How do I register for one of the pre-events?
faq.answer: Each event, pre-event announcement will be floated with a Gform, through which all can register.

faq.question: Do I have to pay for taking part?
faq.answer: Each event, pre-event will have registration charges associated with them, which will be disclosed during their announcement.

rules: All events, pre-events associated with e-Sports is Open For All
Rules depend on the type of game played; Rulebooks for which are provided.
Violation of Rules, as provided in the rulebooks pertaining to a pre-event, will not be tolerated
Have Fun!

title: Funzone
summary: Step into the electrifying realm of FunZone, where excitement knows no bounds! Engage in the pulsating action of neon football, bounce with joy in body zorbing, adorn yourself with radiant neon tattoos, and rev up your adrenaline with heart-pounding RC racing. Prepare for a kaleidoscope of thrills and create indelible memories in the playground of endless fun!

faq.question: What are the timings for the events?
faq.answer: It will be held throughout three days of the OCULUS fest.

faq.question: Are we allowed to register and pay on the spot?
faq.answer: Yes, registrations are open on the day of the event.

rules: Different set of rules for different events. The set of rules are event dependent. And the events are still not confirmed. There is just an estimate or potential but no confirmation

title: IPL Auction
summary: Get ready to be blown away at the IPL Auction, happening now at Oculus! Imagine yourself in the hot seat, bidding for cricket's biggest stars and assembling your dream team. With surprises around every corner, this event is not just thrilling – it's downright addictive! Join us for the ride of a lifetime where fortunes are won and lost in the blink of an eye. Whether you're a die-hard fan or just love a good competition, the IPL Auction at Oculus guarantees non-stop excitement. So, what are you waiting for? Get in on the action and bid your way to victory

faq.question: How are the winners declared?
faq.answer: Each Player has an overall rating out of 100 and 6 individual ratings out of 10 which have bonus points. The team with the highest points at the end of the auction wins.

faq.question: Can I play online with my friends?
faq.answer: Yes, you can play from anywhere with your team.

faq.question: Who all can participate?
faq.answer: Literally anyone of any group are welcome to participate.

rules: The group of participants would comprise of max 4 members and min 1 member.
A total of around 130 players will go under the hammer.
The team has to buy the best possible 11 players using a price pool of 100cr.
The players are categorized into several categories and each team needs to fulfill the criteria of each category.
Each player is given certain ratings. After fulfilling all criteria, the team with the maximum points will be declared the winner on adding all ratings.

title: Sargam
summary: What better opportunity for young aspiring singers with bags of potential to showcase their extraordinary musical side than Sargam’24! Get a chance to allure and amaze the audience with your euphonious melodies and compete to get top-notch prices along with the glory and prestige of winning Sargam’24.

faq.question: What are the different categories one could take part in?
faq.answer: The two categories offered by Sargam are Solo and Duet. Solo Category has 3 sub-categories of Singing, Instrumental and Rap. The third category Rap was introduced last year as the new domain and has become a major hit.

faq.question: Will we get instruments for Sargam?
faq.answer: No, you are required to carry your own instruments.

faq.question: What if we pay for the first round but dont get selected?
faq.answer: You will get refunded if you enter the audition round but are not selected for the finals.

faq.question: Explain the discount offer in detail.
faq.answer: If a participant wishes to take part in 2 or more categories, he gets a discount of 50 rupees for each additional category.

rules: Will be open to all Undergraduate Students.
Audition Round: Participants send a video clip of their performance. The audition clip should not exceed a duration of 3 minutes.

Final Round: Finalists perform in the S.P. Jain auditorium in front of exceptional judges and an audience. The auditions would be judged by a qualified individual, and his/her decision would be final.
There will be four categories: Solo: Instrumental, Singing, Rap Duet. Participants can choose to audition for all four, but can go ahead for a maximum of 2 categories.
If you participate in multiple categories then you will get a discount of Rs.50 after the first registration.
Participants can sing along to the Karaoke version of the song, or play their own musical instruments. Use of autotune is strictly prohibited.

title: SPIT Hackathon
summary: Following tradition, CSI-SPIT is conducting the annual 24-hour SPIT Hackathon in February 2023. This year, we are going back to organizing the hackathon completely in Offline Mode. With a great team and skilled panel of judges, this hackathon will be an ideal platform to put student's knowledge to use and something.

faq.question: Is it free?
faq.answer: Yes it is

rules: No cheating
Proper coding practices to be followed

title: TechRace
summary: Techrace is the mega pre-event of OCULUS which marks the beginning of OCULUS. All college students can participate in this treasure hunt across mumbai whose clues will be available on our app along with a variety of power cards to make the event more fun and challenging

faq.question: Do we need technical skills to participate?
faq.answer: No, it's just for the name

faq.question: Can we participate with other college students?
faq.answer: Yes, you can

faq.question: How do we get points?
faq.answer: You get points based on how much time you take to reach the next location

faq.question: If we cannot solve the clue, do we get hints?
faq.answer: Yes, you can buy two hints for points

rules: You can team up with your friends from different colleges as well or go solo
Only public transport should be used by the participants
You have various power cards which cost you points in the game
Winner is declared on the basis of who reaches the last location first and not who has maximum points

title: Virtual Stock Market
summary: Behold the grandeur of Oculus, the Virtual Stock Market at SPIT, the pinnacle of financial prowess! Welcome to the epicenter of virtual trading where the world's greatest minds gather to shape the future of wealth. Brace yourselves for an unparalleled spectacle, as we usher in a new era of financial dominance. No Stock Guru Skills Required: Don't know a bull from a bear? No worries! This event is all about fun and learning, no stock market PhD needed. Dive into the Oculus Virtual Stock Market at SPIT: Rs.75000 prize pool awaits. Seize your chance to conquer!

faq.question: Do I need prior experience in stock market to participate?
faq.answer: No, the event is Beginner Friendly.

faq.question: How will the leaderboard be decided?
faq.answer: The team with the highest networth wins.

faq.question: How will trading take place?
faq.answer: Each team will be given virtual money to be invested on our platform. News cycles will be displayed during the start of each round. Analyzing this, teams have to decide whether to sell/buy company stock.

rules: Each team may contain 1-2 members
All the participants need not be from the same Institution
There will be a few stocks listed on the market at the beginning and the rest will be introduced as the game progresses
In each round, a set of news will be displayed on your devices. You need to analyze the news and invest accordingly in the stocks
In case of any conflicts, the decision made by the organizing team will be considered final
